heading: HB01470
0: AN ACT TO IMPROVE THE COORDINATION BETWEEN THE DEPARTMENT OF NATIONAL DEFENSE AND THE PHILIPPINE VETERANS AFFAIRS OFFICE TO BETTER PROVIDE CARE TO THE MEMBERS OF THE ARMED FORCES AND VETERANS
status: Pending with the Committee on NATIONAL DEFENSE AND SECURITY since 2016-08-01
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01470
FULL TITLE : AN ACT TO IMPROVE THE COORDINATION BETWEEN THE DEPARTMENT OF NATIONAL DEFENSE AND THE PHILIPPINE VETERANS AFFAIRS OFFICE TO BETTER PROVIDE CARE TO THE MEMBERS OF THE ARMED FORCES AND VETERANS
